TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FormsAuthentication extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 Web 应用程序管理 Forms 身份验证服务。

span.span: Manages forms-authentication services for Web applications.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体身份验证使用户和密码验证的 Web 应用程序不需要 Windows 身份验证。Forms authentication enables user and password validation for Web applications that do not require Windows authentication. 使用窗体身份验证，用户信息存储在外部数据源，如数据库，或应用程序的配置文件中。With forms authentication, user information is stored in an external data source, such as a database, or in the configuration file for an application. 一旦用户进行身份验证，窗体身份验证都维护在 cookie 或 URL 中的身份验证票证，以便经过身份验证的用户不需要提供与每个请求的凭据。Once a user is authenticated, forms authentication maintains an authentication ticket in a cookie or in the URL so that an authenticated user does not need to supply credentials with each request. 通过设置启用 forms 身份验证`mode`到的配置元素的属性`Forms`。Forms authentication is enabled by setting the `mode` attribute of the configuration element to `Forms`. 你可以要求对应用程序的所有请求使用的配置元素为拒绝该任何的请求未知的用户，如下面的示例中所示都包含有效的用户身份验证票证。You can require that all requests to an application contain a valid user authentication ticket by using the configuration element to deny the request of any unknown user, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 在前面的示例中，应用程序的一部分的 ASP.NET 页的任何请求需要由窗体身份验证提供有效的用户名称。In the previous example, any request for an ASP.NET page that is part of the application requires a valid user name that is supplied by forms authentication. 如果用户名不存在，则将请求重定向到已配置。If no user name exists, then the request is redirected to the configured . 类提供给方法和属性可以在对用户进行身份验证的应用程序中使用的访问。The class provides access to methods and properties that you can use in an application that authenticates users. 方法将浏览器重定向到已配置以便用户可以登录到应用程序。The method redirects a browser to the configured for users to log into an application. 方法将身份验证的用户重定向回原始请求的受保护 URL 或。The method redirects an authenticated user back to the original protected URL that was requested or to the . 也有必要使你能够管理窗体身份验证票证的方法。There are also methods that enable you to manage forms-authentication tickets, if needed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的 ASP.NET 应用程序使用 ASP.NET 成员资格提供程序用于表单身份验证，并要求所有用户进行身份验证的 Web.config 文件。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application that uses the ASP.NET membership provider for forms authentication and requires all users to be authenticated. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示的 ASP.NET 应用程序使用窗体身份验证和 ASP.NET 成员身份的登录页。The following code example shows the login page for an ASP.NET application that uses forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证方法验证应用程序配置文件的部分中存储的用户凭据。The Authenticate method verifies user credentials that are stored in the section of the application configuration file. 或者，可以使用 ASP.NET 成员身份来存储用户凭据和调用以验证凭据。Alternatively, you can use ASP.NET membership to store user credentials and call the to verify the credentials. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For more information, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 为了提高安全性，你可以对密码进行加密存储在应用程序的配置文件，通过使用方法。For improved security, you can encrypt passwords stored in the configuration file for an application by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示存储在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的用户凭据。The following code example shows user credentials stored in the Web.config file for an application. 密码值具有已进行哈希运算使用方法。The password values have been hashed using the method. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` 下面的代码示例演示使用登录页方法来验证用户凭据。The following code example shows a login page that uses the method to validate user credentials. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性反映的值`cookieless`配置元素的属性。The property reflects the value for the `cookieless` attribute of the configuration element. 属性确定是否将存储在浏览器中的会话 cookie 值，或将其存储在属性。The property determines whether the value will be stored in a session cookie in the browser or stored in the property. > [!NOTE] > 当值存储在 URI 中，生成的 URI 的长度可能超过允许的最大长度。When the value is stored in the URI, the length of the generated URI may be longer than the maximum length allowed. 这是最有可能发生时属性设置为应用程序名称和应用程序名称太长 （40 或多个字符），当用户在应用程序名称时较长，或者长字符串存储在值。This is most likely to occur when the property is set to the application name and the application name is long (40 or more characters), when user names in the application are long, or when long strings are stored in the value. 如果生成的 URI 是太长，则 Web 服务器将返回`400 - Bad Request`错误。If the generated URI is too long, the Web server will return a `400 - Bad Request` error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`cookieless`属性设为`AutoDetect`Web.config 文件中。The following code example sets the `cookieless` attribute to `AutoDetect` in the Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用设置属性值`enableCrossAppRedirects`配置元素的属性。The property value is set using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the configuration element. 中选中属性方法时重定向 URL 未指向当前应用程序中的页。The property is checked within the method when the redirect URL does not point to a page in the current application. 如果是`true`，然后执行重定向; 如果是`false`，将浏览器重定向到中定义的页属性。If is `true`, then the redirect is performed; if is `false`, the browser is redirected to the page defined in the property. > [!NOTE] > 当跨应用程序重定向页时，必须确保内经过身份验证的应用程序重复的配置元素中的特定属性。When you redirect pages across applications, you must make sure that specific attributes in the configuration element are duplicated across the authenticated applications. 有关详细信息及示例，请参阅[跨应用程序的窗体身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7)。For more information and an example, see [Forms Authentication Across Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7). > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果允许跨应用程序重定向，你的站点容易受到攻击，将用户定向到恶意网站，但为您的网站使用的登录页。When cross-application redirects are allowed, your site is vulnerable to an exploit that directs users to a malicious Web site but uses the login page for your site. 始终验证重定向 URL 返回方法是希望，以便你可以确保你允许重定向仅到已批准的网站的 URL。Always verify that the redirect URL that is returned by the method is a URL that you expect so that you can make sure that you allow redirects only to approved Web sites. 你还必须验证重定向 URL，使用适当的协议 （HTTP 或 HTTPS）。You must also verify that the redirect URL uses the appropriate protocol (HTTP or HTTPS). 若要执行这些验证，可以将一个回发事件处理程序添加到您的登录页，也可以添加的处理程序事件控件。To perform these verifications, you can add a postback event handler to your login page, or you can add a handler for the event of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`enableCrossAppRedirects`属性设为`true`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。The following code example sets the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute to `true` in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法，当你想要在而不是使用应用程序代码中执行重定向方法。You can use this method when you want to perform the redirect in your application code instead of using the method. 方法返回在查询字符串中使用指定的 URL`ReturnURL`变量名称。The method returns the URL specified in the query string using the `ReturnURL` variable name. 例如，在 URL 中`http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`、方法返回的返回 URL `caller.aspx`。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`, the method returns the return URL `caller.aspx`. 如果`ReturnURL`变量不存在，方法返回中的 URL属性。If the `ReturnURL` variable does not exist, the method returns the URL in the property. 将浏览器重定向到登录页时，ASP.NET 会自动添加的返回 URL。ASP.NET automatically adds the return URL when the browser is redirected to the login page. 默认情况下，`ReturnUrl`变量必须引用某页在当前应用程序中。By default, the `ReturnUrl` variable must refer to a page within the current application. 如果`ReturnUrl`指的是在不同的应用程序或不同的服务器上的页面方法将返回中的 URL属性。If `ReturnUrl` refers to a page in a different application or on a different server, the methods returns the URL in the property. 如果你想要允许使用返回的 URL 来指代当前应用程序之外的网页，则必须设置属性`true`使用`enableCrossAppRedirects`配置元素的属性。If you want to allow the return URL to refer to a page outside the current application, you must set the property to `true` using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the configuration element. 此方法不会创建一个 cookie。This method does not create a cookie. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置属性`true`以允许跨应用程序重定向是一个潜在的安全威胁。Setting the property to `true` to allow cross-application redirects is a potential security threat. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重定向到的 URL 的经过身份验证的用户返回从方法。The following code example redirects authenticated users to the URL returned from the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个经过哈希处理的密码值，可在时存储窗体身份验证凭据在应用程序配置文件中。The method creates a hashed password value that can be used when storing forms-authentication credentials in the configuration file for an application. 使用存储在应用程序配置文件的身份验证凭据方法以验证的应用程序的用户的密码。Authentication credentials stored in the configuration file for an application are used by the method to verify passwords for users of an application. 或者，可以使用 ASP.NET 成员资格来存储用户凭据。Alternatively, you can use ASP.NET membership to store user credentials. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For more information, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). ## Examples 下面的代码示例采用用户名、 密码和哈希类型，并显示包含用户定义和经过哈希处理的密码的配置节。The following code example takes a user name, password, and hash type and displays the section of the configuration that includes the user definition and hashed password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 ASP.NET 应用程序配置文件中设置属性值`requireSSL`配置元素的属性。The property value is set in the configuration file for an ASP.NET application by using the `requireSSL` attribute of the configuration element. 你可以在 Web.config 文件中为指定 ASP.NET 应用程序是否需要 SSL （安全套接字层） 来返回到服务器的窗体身份验证 cookie，通过设置`requireSSL`属性。You can specify in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application whether SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is required to return the forms-authentication cookie to the server by setting the `requireSSL` attribute . 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 如果你配置建议，`requireSSL`作为`false`，还配置`slidingExpiration`作为`false`，从而缩短票证的有效时间量。It is recommended that if you configure `requireSSL` as `false`, you also configure `slidingExpiration` as `false`, to reduce the amount of time for which a ticket is valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`requireSSL`Web.config 文件中的属性。The following code example sets the `requireSSL` attribute in the Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法： 将窗体身份验证票证添加 cookie 集合或 URL，如果是`false`。The method adds a forms-authentication ticket to either the cookies collection or the URL if is `false`. 窗体身份验证票证提供到下一步所做的浏览器的请求的窗体身份验证信息。The forms-authentication ticket supplies forms-authentication information to the next request made by the browser. 使用窗体身份验证，你可以使用方法时您想要对用户进行身份验证，但仍保留使用重定向对导航的控制。With forms authentication, you can use the method when you want to authenticate a user but still retain control of the navigation with redirects.

summary.span: 从浏览器删除 Forms 身份验证票证。

span.span: Removes the forms-authentication ticket from the browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的窗体身份验证票证信息如果从中删除 cookie 或 URL是`false`。The method removes the forms-authentication ticket information from the cookie or the URL if is `false`. 你可以使用方法结合方法以一个用户注销并允许不同的用户可以登录。You can use the method in conjunction with the method to log one user out and allow a different user to log in. 如果无 cookie 模式，以独占方式运行，或如果支持经过身份验证和匿名用户，你应显式控制重定向到登录页，如果需要特殊的业务逻辑，若要移除的匿名标识符后执行。If you run exclusively in cookieless mode, or if you support both authenticated and anonymous users, you should explicitly control the redirect to the login page if you require special business logic to execute as a result of removing the anonymous identifier. 当方法被调用时，重定向到应用程序的登录页所做的调用方法替换`endResponse`参数设置为`false`。When the method is called, a redirect to the application's login page is made by calling the method with the `endResponse` parameter set to `false`. 重定向不进行直到当前页已完成执行，以便可以运行附加代码。The redirect does not take place until the current page has finished executing, so additional code can be run. 如果代码不包含的显式重定向到另一页，则会将用户重定向到应用程序的配置文件中配置的登录页。If the code does not contain an explicit redirect to another page, the user is redirected to the login page configured in the application's configuration file. 调用方法仅删除窗体身份验证 cookie。Calling the method only removes the forms authentication cookie. Web 服务器不存储有效和过期的身份验证票证以便更高版本的比较。The Web server does not store valid and expired authentication tickets for later comparison. 这使得您的网站很容易遭受重播攻击，如果恶意用户获得有效的窗体身份验证 cookie。This makes your site vulnerable to a replay attack if a malicious user obtains a valid forms authentication cookie. 为了提高安全性，使用窗体身份验证 cookie 时，应执行以下操作：To improve security when using a forms authentication cookie, you should do the following: - 用于窗体的身份验证 cookie 设置绝对过期属性`false`。Use absolute expiration for forms authentication cookies by setting the property to `false`. 这就限制了可以在其中重播被劫持的 cookie 窗口。This limits the window in which a hijacked cookie can be replayed. - 仅发布和接受身份验证 cookie，请通过安全套接字层 (SSL)，通过设置属性`true`以及通过运行整个网站在 SSL 下。Only issue and accept authentication cookies over Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), by setting the property to `true` and by running the entire Web site under SSL. 设置属性`true`可确保，ASP.NET 会永远不会将身份验证 cookie 发送到浏览器通过非 SSL 连接; 但是，客户端可能不接受该 cookie 的安全设置。Setting the property to `true` ensures that ASP.NET will never send an authentication cookie to the browser over a non-SSL connection; however, the client might not honor the secure setting on the cookie. 这意味着客户端可能发送的窗体身份验证 cookie 通过非 SSL 连接，从而使易受到劫持。This means the client might send the forms authentication cookie over a non-SSL connection, thus leaving it vulnerable to hijack. 你可以防止客户端通过运行在 SSL 下整个网站以明文发送的窗体身份验证 cookie。You can prevent a client from sending the forms authentication cookie in the clear by running the entire Web site under SSL. - 在服务器上使用持久存储记录当用户注销该网站，以及如何将应用程序事件如事件，以确定是否当前的用户进行身份验证通过 forms 身份验证。Use persistent storage on the server to record when a user logs out of the Web site, and then use an application event such as event to determine whether the current user was authenticated with forms authentication. 如果用户进行身份验证通过 forms 身份验证，并且如果持久存储中的信息指示用户已注销，立即清除身份验证 cookie，并将浏览器重定向回登录页。If the user was authenticated with forms authentication, and if the information in persistent storage indicates the user is logged out, immediately clear the authentication cookie and redirect the browser back to the login page. 成功登录后，更新存储以反映用户已登录。After a successful login, update storage to reflect that the user is logged in. 当你使用此方法时，你的应用程序必须跟踪的用户的登录状态，并必须强制空闲用户注销。When you use this method, your application must track the logged-in status of the user, and must force idle users to log out. ## Examples 下面的代码示例清除窗体身份验证 cookie 使用方法然后将重定向到登录名用户页上使用方法。The following code example clears the forms-authentication cookie using the method and redirects the user to the login page using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication/CS/signoutcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication/VB/signoutvb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用弹性过期时间。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether sliding expiration is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用可调过期，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if sliding expiration is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用设置属性值`slidingExpiration`配置元素的属性。The property value is set using the `slidingExpiration` attribute of the configuration element. 相对过期机制重置为有效的身份验证 cookie 的到期时间，如果发出请求，并且有超过一半的超时间隔已过。Sliding expiration resets the expiration time for a valid authentication cookie if a request is made and more than half of the timeout interval has elapsed. 如果 cookie 已过期，用户必须重新进行身份验证。If the cookie expires, the user must re-authenticate. 设置属性`false`可应用的安全性通过限制提高的身份验证 cookie 的有效，时间基于配置`timeout`值。Setting the property to `false` can improve the security of an application by limiting the time for which an authentication cookie is valid, based on the configured `timeout` value. 我们建议，如果你配置`requireSSL`作为`false`，还配置`slidingExpiration`作为`false`，从而缩短票证的有效时间量。We recommend that if you configure `requireSSL` as `false`, you also configure `slidingExpiration` as `false`, to reduce the amount of time for which a ticket is valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`slidingExpiration`属性设为`false`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。The following code example sets the `slidingExpiration` attribute to `false` in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ``` ```
